```{r}
#uji korelasi
library(psych)
pairs.panels(data_anareg4, method = "spearman", hist.col = "red", densty = T, ellipses = T, lm =F)
```


```{r}

df = subset(data_anareg4)
df
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```
```{r}
modelreg=lm(df$`Nilai Tukar Rupiah`~df$inflasi+df$`uang beredar`+df$`BI rate`+df$`nilai impor`+df$`nilai ekspor`,data=df)
summary(modelreg)
anova(modelreg)
```
```{r}
#normalitas
sisa <- residuals(modelreg)
shapiro.test(sisa)
qqnorm(data_anareg4$`Nilai Tukar Rupiah`,pch = 1, frame = FALSE)
qqline(data_anareg4$`Nilai Tukar Rupiah`, col = "red", lwd = 2)
```


```{r}
#autokorelasi 
dwtest(modelreg)
#Heteroskedisitas
bptest(modelreg)
plot(modelreg)
#multikolinearitas
vif(modelreg)
```

```{r}
cormat=cor(df)
corrplot::corrplot(cormat, method = "square")

```
